price: Siz (düşmənlə) qarşılaşmadan öncə, (Allah yolunda) ölməyi arzulayırdınız. İndi isə siz onu gördüyünüz halda baxıb durursunuz.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ تَمَنَّوۡنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تَلۡقَوۡهُ فَقَدۡ رَأَيۡتُمُوهُ وَأَنتُمۡ تَنظُرُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad kuntum tamannawna al-mawta min qabli an talqawhu faqad ra-aytumūhu wa-antum tanẓurūna
